messages.subject: 10% off code for Babycenter thru 12am 7/26
messages.msgSnippet: 10% off everything? Yes! But only if you hurry over to the BabyCenter Store. Through Friday, save 10% on all our great products* — including hundreds of sale
messages.messageBody:
10% off everything?
Yes! But only if you hurry over to the BabyCenter Store. Through Friday,
save 10% on all our great products* � including hundreds of sale items
already marked down.

--Enter coupon code 14129128 at checkout.--

Start shopping! (Offer ends at midnight this Friday, July 26.)

Shop our entire Store or go directly to these must-haves for new parents:
� 10% off car seats, including our bestselling Britax Roundabout
� 10% off highchairs and boosters, including our Graco Double Tray and
Hook-On Chair
� 10% off play yards, including our soothing Rock-n-Play with bassinet
� 10% off strollers, including our joggers and lightweight models
� 10% off bottles, including our handy Mix-On-the-Go bottle system
� 10% off healthcare products, including Gripe Water for your baby's tummy
� 10% off toys, books & video, including the adorable Tucker the Turtle toy

Remember to enter your coupon code at checkout to get 10% off everything in
your order!

Offer Details
-The 10% off coupon can be applied to everything except items marked "no
coupons or discounts."
-When you use the coupon for an item that's already marked down, you'll get
10% off the sale price.
-You must enter coupon code 14129128 during checkout to receive the
additional 10% off.
-Offer expires Friday, July 26, 2002, at 11:59 p.m. Pacific time.
-Coupon cannot be applied to orders already placed.
-Quantities are limited; no rain checks on out-of-stock items.
-Offer may not be combined with other promotions or discounts; only one
coupon may be applied per order.









The secret to life isn't getting what you want it's wanting it once you get
it-Katherine Hepburn in "Love Affair"

Remember starting the fire is easy, the hardest part is learning how to keep
the flame-Stevie Nicks "Love's A Hard Game To Play" Timespace
